abstract: Instead, here are some famous Broadway composers depicted as "South Park" cartoon characters.
snippet: Instead, here are some famous Broadway composers depicted as "South Park" cartoon characters.
lead_paragraph: In retrospect, it was a good thing we talked to Robert Lopez about his contributions to Wednesday night's episode of "South Park" before it was even written, because now that it has been broadcast we're not sure what we can say about it.

headline.main: 'South Park' Goes Broadway and Leaves Us Speechless
